ygData.subject: RE: Part of a rune
ygData.msgSnippet: Is for crafted armor ... From:	Donald Taber [mailto:dtaber@corp.home.net] Sent:	Wednesday, July 21, 1999 10:27 AM To:	Research EQ Spells Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
Is for crafted armor

-----Original Message-----
From: Donald Taber [mailto:dtaber@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 10:27 AM
To: Research EQ Spells
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Part of a rune

From: Donald Taber <dtaber@...>

Yesterday in Runnyeye my group managed to kill one of the
evil eyes that
attacked. I looted the body and found "Top part of a rune".
The item
is a lore item which is also "no drop" (it can not be
traded, dropped,
or sold).

We continued fighting there the rest of the night and killed
another
evil eye. This one had "Middle part of a rune". This is
also a lore
item but is not listed as "no drop", so the group gave this
part to me
also.

I have also heard these pieces have been found in South
Karanas.

Now I am assuming there is also a "Bottom part of a rune",
but does
anyone know what these are for? Is it a quest somewhere to
assemble
this rune? If so, what rune?


Soren

26th
Level Wizard

The
Rathe



--------------------------- ONElist Sponsor
----------------------------

ONElist: your connection to online communities.


------------------------------------------------------------------------
This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for
spell research. Please keep the emails on topic. Offensive remarks will
not be tolerated, no warnings. Apologies will be considered, but repeat
offenders will be banned permanently.
